T02TD1777E:271b-1: shr'i ma h'a k'a la de w'i sto tra aashta n'a ma /
T02TD1777E:271b-3: dpal lha mo nag mo chen mol bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1777E:271b-4: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1777E:271b-5: til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pa ro nye'i rna chas sgeg cing cha lugs ma lus 'chang //
T02TD1777E:271b-6: rgyan du rkang sgrogs lcags las byas pa cig gis rang gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa de //
T02TD1777E:271b-7: gcer bu bong bu zhon zhing 'gro ba 'di na rgyu ba de ni lha mo khyod nyid kyis //
T02TD1777E:271b-8: bdag nyid mdzes par shes kyis gzhan ltas khyod kyi spyod pa'i mtsho chen don dag su yis shes //
T02TD1777E:271b-9: 'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi lus ngag las khrag dang zhag 'dzag dud pa 'thul ba na //
T02TD1777E:271b-10: lha mo mche ba mi bzang khyod kyis zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam gyis zhugs par 'gyur //
T02TD1777E:271b-11: nag mo mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i rnal 'byor can te dur khrod dgyes //
T02TD1777E:271b-12: khyod ni g-yo byed mnan cing nad chen 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa bsal zhing mi bzad dril yang sgrogs //
T02TD1777E:271b-13: khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bos cod pan gyis ni legs sbas g-yul du mtshon gyis bcad pa yi //
T02TD1777E:272a-0: phreng ba thogs shing gar byed lag pa mnyen brkyang rkub tshos che la klu @272a * //
T02TD1777E:272a-2: ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang ral gri thogs la khrag gi chang gis myos par 'gyur //
T02TD1777E:272a-3: mig rtsa dmar por gyur cing mtshan mo dur khrod 'gro ba 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis mthong //
T02TD1777E:272a-4: ko rlon chen po dral te brkyangs pa'i gos kyis man pas shing phyed g-yogs phyed ni re ldes dkris //
T02TD1777E:272a-5: mi yi rgyu ma gsar pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing dril bu 'gram par 'khrol //
T02TD1777E:272a-6: lus ni snum gyis gsar du byugs shing khrag dang zhag la sogs pa'i thig les tshom bur bris //
T02TD1777E:272a-7: mi yi sha la so yis chem chem gcod byed thod pa can ni bdag la skyong gyur cig / drag po drag mo mi bzad mi sha kha na thogs pa sngon chad ma byung khyod mthong nas //
T02TD1777E:272a-8: ma mo rnams kyang skrag cing brtabs la rngam pa 'thon cing mig rtsa rig rig khyod la 'dud //
T02TD1777E:272a-9: nag mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sogs kyang //
T02TD1777E:272a-10: nyin gcig bzhin du bstod pa byed de gshin rje nyid kyang rtag tu 'dar zhing 'dud par byed //
T02TD1777E:272a-11: mi rnams dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa dag mjug brtul ba ni rna ba ya gcig la //
T02TD1777E:272a-12: brang gis 'gro ba 'go bo'i gdengs ka stong dang ldan ba rgyab nas rgyan du byas nas gnas //
T02TD1777E:272a-13: ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtshos bskor ba'i sa gzhi ma lus gnon //
T02TD1777E:272a-14: steng na rgyu ba'i nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan khyod kyi lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs su gzhag / rgya mtsho'i klong nas me 'bar khyod //
T02TD1777E:272a-15: chu rnams skems par nus pa ste //
T02TD1777E:272a-16: bud med thams cad zhi bya'i phyir //
T02TD1777E:272a-17: lha chen sku yi phyed du bzhag / rdzong dang dka' zlog nag mo che //
T02TD1777E:272a-18: lha dang lha min phyag byas pa //
T02TD1777E:272a-19: mi nad gang yin khyod kyis shes //
T02TD1777E:272a-20: de ni 'jigs pa med par mdzod //
T02TD1777E:272a-21: gshin rje'i lcam mo bdud kyi yum //
T02TD1777E:272a-22: 'dod khams dbang phyug ma la bstod //
T02TD1777E:272a-23: nad do cog gi bdag mo dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo la bstod pa brgyad pa zhes bya ba bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
